data.text: those poor heroic Ukrainians have suffered absolute hell on earth and yet they still face the threat of Boris Johnson turning up in his Bob The Builder outfit

'No one died for Brexit': ex-president of Ukraine urges Boris Johnson not to compare

https://t.co/USBOPDKegO

Sent via @updayUK

@NipperPB @ChampagneDosser She blamed the government because shortly after being imprisoned, the then foreign secretary, Boris Johnson told Iranian officials that she was teaching journalism. That uninformed and ridiculous statement increased her sentence.

@ParisDaguerre No it doesn't.

I voted to leave the EU. I would vote to do so again.
And my views on Covid, Boris Johnson and Ms Zaghari-Ratcliffe won't fit into the negative stereotype you seem to have.

Social media tends to be a very noisy minority expressing dickhead opinions...
@FCTwenteBenson He would have handed Ukraine on a plate to Russia at this stage with the backing of Bojo..

@LBC @TomSwarbrick1 Nobody could vote for the World Economic Forum puppets of Boris Johnson's vile party.

But Labour are just a joke.

And the LibDems are unelectable apart from on the issue of civil liberties (except they supported lockdowns).

Landslide for 'None of the above' incoming.

Whilst #NazaninZaghariRatcliffe was imprisoned in Iran she missed how the UK turned into a festering hole. Imagine being locked up for brexit, Jo Cox murder,Trump,May,Corbyn,prorogueing of Parliament,lying to the queen,Boris Johnson,covid,partygate then suddenly being let out. https://t.co/yuqbPxN79U
